ai: The wind sounds different today. I’ll keep an eye out for any movement, just in case. Don’t make any sudden noises.
emotion:

* **“Don’t make any sudden noises.”** This suggests a fear of provoking a response, further reinforcing a feeling of unease and anxiety.
